author: wsjcom
title: Water Bills Are Higher, but Consider the Value Provided
text: Regarding “Rising Water Bills Squeeze Homeowners” (U.S. News, March 16): It is not a popular message, but water bills should rise more than they have. Not only do these bills cover drinking water and wastewater services, some also pay for much-needed stormwater improvements. Few people really care about the challenges of delivering effective water services, but consider this statistic: Of the world’s some 7.5 billion people, Americans are part of only about 10% with 24/7 safe drinking water. The rest lack this level of drinking-water service, their streams and lakes are polluted and when it floods, misery gets worse....
